title: Meet the retired oil exec plugging forgotten wells to reduce emissions

multiple-choice.question: What is the estimated number of orphan oil and gas wells in the United States?
What is the main environmental concern associated with orphan oil and gas wells?
What is the cost of plugging a well, according to the video?
What is the name of the non-profit organization featured in the video that is working to plug orphan oil and gas wells?

options.label: B
options.text: The Oil and Gas Well Plugging Organization

options.label: D
options.text: The National Oil and Gas Association

multiple-choice.question: What is the name of the person featured in the video who uses air monitoring instruments to track down and measure emissions from abandoned wells?
What is the estimated number of unplugged orphan wells in Pennsylvania?
What is the name of the bill that was passed in 2021 to address the issue of orphan oil and gas wells?

options.label: B
options.text: The Oil and Gas Well Plugging Act

options.label: D
options.text: The National Oil and Gas Association Act

multiple-choice.question: What is the amount of funding allocated to the Department of Interior to plug wells on federal lands?
What is the expected outcome of the Regrow Act?

options.label: A
options.text: To plug all orphan oil and gas wells

options.label: C
options.text: To reduce emissions from abandoned wells

options.label: D
options.text: To increase funding for oil and gas production

multiple-choice.question: What is the long-term solution to the problem of orphan oil and gas wells?

options.label: A
options.text: To increase funding for oil and gas production

options.label: B
options.text: To reduce emissions from abandoned wells

options.label: C
options.text: To plug all orphan oil and gas wells

options.label: D
options.text: To transition to renewable energy sources
